articles.description: Some experts opined that they only saw a glimpse of Kohli's dominating self, while others were pleased with the knock and India legend Kapil Dev, joining the bandwagon, gave his verdict on Kohli's return in the Pakistan tie. | Cricket
articles.content: After a month-long break, former India captain Virat Kohli returned to the Indian team for the Asia Cup and was picked in the playing XI for the blockbuster match against Pakistan on Sunday in Dubai … [+1899 chars]
